greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n OR 3n, where OR is bitwise OR.
mathematica: f[n_] := BitOr[n, 3n]; Array[f, 61, 0] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 28 2010 *)
results.author: _Dmitry Kamenetsky_, Jun 21 2010
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 28 2010
